About Me

Chemistry, medicine, and the human condition. I am a budding chemist, soon to be on the job market. My research interests are in the areas of psychological disorders, chemical imbalances, and psychiatric pharmacology. My doctoral disertation was on repressing psychotic tendancies with household serums and I plan to continue this research... at all costs.

Feel free to download my CV.

Research

  1. H. Jekyll, “Home Remedies for Multiple Personality Disorders,” 1885. [arXiv][NBER][PDF]

Teaching

Intro to Chem. King's College London. Fall 1885 Teaching students chemistry isn't only for witches.

Advanced Psychiatric Medicine. King's College London. Spring 1885 At the time

Diseases of the Mind. King's College London. Fall 1884 Survey course. Mainly taught by example.
